data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will continue to affect Guangdong in the next few days. Meanwhile, a band of rain and clouds will gradually cover the northern part of the South China Sea and the coast of Guangdong. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to affect the coast of southern China midweek next week. There will be one or two rain patches and temperatures will fall over the region. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Koto will move across the central and southern parts of the South China Sea in the next couple of days. It will then move in the general direction of the vicinity of Vietnam, weakening gradually under the influence of the northeast monsoon. On the other hand, an area of low pressure associated with the remnant of Tropical Cyclone Senyar is bringing unsettled weather to the seas east of the Malay Peninsula, and it may intensify slightly.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251129","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, force 5 offshore.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine and dry.
